position_overview.title: Data & Insights Analyst Intern
position_overview.summary: Support business decision-making by analyzing data, building dashboards, and delivering actionable insights. Ideal for analytical thinkers passionate about data visualization and storytelling.

key_responsibilities: Collect, clean, and analyze large data sets
Build dashboards and visualizations using Power BI or Tableau
Generate actionable insights for marketing and operations teams
Assist in preparing business performance reports
requirements: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Proficiency in Excel and data visualization tools
Basic understanding of SQL or Python for data analysis
Attention to detail and data accuracy

team.collaboration: You'll collaborate with data engineers and business analysts

position_overview.title: Product/Operations Analyst Intern
position_overview.summary: Work closely with product and operations teams to analyze performance, track KPIs, and improve process efficiency.

key_responsibilities: Analyze product performance metrics and operational KPIs
Support sprint planning and backlog refinement
Assist in creating reports for product decision-making
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify improvements
requirements: Basic understanding of business operations and product lifecycle
Experience with Excel or data tracking tools
Strong communication and organizational skills

team.collaboration: You'll work with product managers and analysts

position_overview.title: Market Research Analyst Intern
position_overview.summary: Conduct market and competitor research to identify trends, opportunities, and customer insights that inform strategic business decisions.

key_responsibilities: Gather and analyze market and competitor data
Design and execute surveys and interviews
Prepare reports summarizing research findings
Support marketing and strategy teams with data-driven insights
requirements: Strong research and analytical skills
Ability to interpret quantitative and qualitative data
Good written communication and reporting skills

team.collaboration: You'll collaborate with research and marketing teams

position_overview.title: UI Design Intern (User Interface)
position_overview.summary: Design intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces that enhance user experiences and align with brand identity.

key_responsibilities: Create user interface designs for web and mobile apps
Develop style guides and design components
Collaborate with UX designers and developers
Ensure visual consistency across all digital assets
requirements: Proficiency in Figma or Adobe XD
Understanding of color theory and typography
Creative eye for design and detail orientation

team.collaboration: You'll collaborate with the UX and development teams

position_overview.title: UX Design Intern (User Experience)
position_overview.summary: Learn how to design seamless and user-centered experiences by conducting research, testing prototypes, and improving usability.

key_responsibilities: Conduct user research and usability testing
Create wireframes and user flows
Collaborate with UI designers and developers
Document and present UX findings
requirements: Basic knowledge of UX research methods
Experience with prototyping tools like Figma or Miro
Empathy and attention to user needs

team.collaboration: You'll work closely with UX researchers and developers

position_overview.title: Product Design Intern
position_overview.summary: Combine UI and UX principles to design complete digital product experiences from concept to prototype.

key_responsibilities: Design end-to-end product experiences
Collaborate with cross-functional teams on prototypes
Conduct user testing and iterate on feedback
requirements: Knowledge of design thinking processes
Experience with prototyping and design tools
Strong visual and interaction design skills

team.collaboration: You'll collaborate with UI, UX, and product teams

position_overview.title: Front End Development Internship
position_overview.summary: Develop responsive web applications using modern front-end technologies while collaborating with designers and back-end developers.

key_responsibilities: Build and maintain responsive web interfaces
Collaborate with UI/UX designers and back-end teams
Ensure code quality and performance optimization
requirements: Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Familiarity with frameworks like React or Vue.js
Ability to debug and test code effectively

team.collaboration: You'll collaborate closely with design and engineering teams

position_overview.title: Full Stack Development Internship
position_overview.summary: Gain experience across both front-end and back-end development by contributing to full-cycle web application projects.

key_responsibilities: Develop full-stack web applications
Integrate APIs and manage databases
Collaborate with designers and QA testers
requirements: Knowledge of JavaScript, Node.js, and databases
Understanding of RESTful APIs
Good problem-solving and teamwork skills

team.collaboration: You'll work with both front-end and back-end developers

position_overview.title: Backend Developer Intern
position_overview.summary: Work on building scalable server-side applications, APIs, and database systems that power front-end solutions.

key_responsibilities: Develop and maintain backend APIs and services
Work with databases and optimize data structures
Collaborate with front-end teams to integrate APIs
requirements: Knowledge of Node.js, Python, or Java
Understanding of databases like MySQL or MongoDB
Familiarity with REST API development

team.collaboration: You'll collaborate with full stack and front-end developers
